titleStmt.title: Despatch from Nathaniel Lyons to Bancroft Davis, February 21, 1874

bibl.title: Despatch from Nathaniel Lyons to Bancroft Davis, February 21, 1874
Despatches from United States Consuls in Sierra Leone, 1858-1906 T-438

correspAction.persName: Davis, J. C. Bancroft (John Chandler Bancroft), 1822-1907

div1.p:
Consulate of the United States
Sierra Leone Feby. 21st 1874

To the Honble J. C. B. Davis
Assistant Secretary
Department of State
Washington U.S.A.

I have this day drawn on you, favor of Messrs Mansfield & Roberts of Boston, for the sum of Seventy three dollars ninety two cents, for moneys paid by me, for boarding, lodging, and clothing three destitute American Seaman, as per vouchers enclosed. Be pleased to honor my draft.

I have the honor to be
Sir
Your most obdt Servant
Nathl Lyons
Acting U.S. Consul for Sierra Leone

Enclosures. Receipt for £2.2.0 John H. Lewis
do 4.7.0 Charles Mitchell
do 6.5.0 do
do 2.14.0 Charles Murphy.
£15.8.0 @ $4.80 equal to $73.92 cts.
